      • invokeDigitalCareAsFragment

        protected void invokeDigitalCareAsFragment(android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity context,
                                           int parentContainerResId,
                                           com.philips.platform.uappframework.listener.ActionBarListener actionbarUpdateListener,
                                           int enterAnim,
                                           int exitAnim)

        Invoking DigitalCareComponent feautures to your Fragment Container. Please use this method.

        Note:

        1) Please consider the string "digitalcare" to identify the MainScreen Fragment as a Fragment ID.

        2) Please make sure to set the Locale before calling this method.

        Parameters:
        context - Context of the FragmentActivity
        parentContainerResId - Fragment container resource ID
        actionbarUpdateListener - ActionbarUpdateListener instance
        enterAnim - Animation resource ID.
        exitAnim - Animation resource ID.
